item.title: Shop problem
item.dc:creator: @Antonio23 Antonio23
item.description:
@Antonio23 wrote:

I have a question. I made a shop. Now I can open the shop and see all the items.
However, when i value them the client crashed and when i try buy nothing occurs.

This is the script:

[code]case 1917: //bandit
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 1;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop1, p.shop1n);
p.frames.setString(p, " <col=ffffff><img=1>The general armour shop<img=0>", 278, 88);

	break;[/code]

Somewhere else I made the shops. The value of the price is shop1p but where do I need to put it?

Read full topic
